title: This Specialized Aethos Hybrid Weighs Under 10 Pounds
content:
Fair Wheel Bikes built a 4.49kg cruiser that defies weight-weenie logic, featuring a single rear brake and a build list meant for downtown, not the Dolomites.

Read the full article at This Specialized Aethos Hybrid Weighs Under 10 Pounds on Velo.
author: Josh Ross
